## containsUppercase() function

Does the provided string contain uppercase letters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function containsUppercase(word: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  word | string | Word to check |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if the word contains uppercase letters, false if not
